item.description:
UNDEAD BEAT NIGHT @ The Press Room
scary Jazz and Poetry Upstairs - NO COVER Charge

A special, scary Halloween edition of Beat Night.  Come for dinner or just a drink.

Beat Night: It's Jazz and Poetry upstairs with NO COVER charge. Groovy.

(It looks like there may also be a band playing downstairs as well.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hey man, be cool and get out of your pad on a Thursday night. We always have a hip time at the Press Room - and it's FREE!   Can you dig it?

Stay for just an hour or, like, stay longer if you want.  It's cool.

7-9pm.  Goatees and costumes optional.

Click for: The Press Room

Beat Night is an every 3rd Thursday happening @ The Press Room.
item.name: Halloween Beat Night @ The Press Room
